orig_text: For instance, the network may perform HTTP redirection or modify DNS behavior (Section 4.1) until the user has not authenticated.
correct_text: For instance, the network may perform HTTP redirection or modify DNS behavior (Section 4.1) until the user has been authenticated.

orig_text:
Until the user has not authenticated
When the user has not authenticated
correct_text:
Until the user has been authenticated
When the user has been authenticated
